greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = 1 if n is an odd number which is not a square, 0 otherwise.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
mathematica: Array[Boole@ And[OddQ@ #, ! IntegerQ@ Sqrt@ #] &, 105] (* _Michael De Vlieger_, Mar 30 2019 *)
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 28 2019
